price: Yanabahaye ibyo mwamusabye byose, kandi muramutse mushatse kubarura inema za Allah ntimwazihetura. Mu by’ukuri umuntu ni inkozi y’ibibi ya cyane, umuhakanyi ukabije (w’indashima).
arabic: وَءَاتَىٰكُم مِّن كُلِّ مَا سَأَلۡتُمُوهُۚ وَإِن تَعُدُّواْ نِعۡمَتَ ٱللَّهِ لَا تُحۡصُوهَآۗ إِنَّ ٱلۡإِنسَٰنَ لَظَلُومٞ كَفَّارٞ

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: waātākum min kulli mā sa-altumūhu wa-in taʿuddū niʿ'mata al-lahi lā tuḥ'ṣūhā inna al-insāna laẓalūmun kaffārun
translations: you will (be able to) count them
